112122112112211112.content:
As Tommy brought his foot down, he was in no position to notice when a speck-sized form threw itself from the ledge of the trash can's rim, attempting a last-ditch action to avoid being squished beneath the teenager's massive sneaker.

Successful at compacting the trash, Tommy lifted the bag from the can, spun it around in the air and twisted the large plastic container closed. With a grunt, he hoisted the bag into the air, deciding he would carry the trash to the curb for collection.

If he had bothered to look down (he didn't) at the kitchen tiles, the teenager might have detected the scurrying movement of one bug-sized scientist, dazed and confused by his death-defying lunge from the nearly full trash can, as he tried desperately to keep some distance between himself and Tommy's enormous footwear.

A few moments later, the chore completed, Tommy stomped back into the kitchen and withdrew his phone from a pocket of his pants. Tommy was absorbed in scanning a list he had been compiling for the upcoming Christmas holiday. He had plenty of items on his wish list, hoping his parents would see fit to purchase most of them for him.

"It's going to be a sweet holiday," he commented as he walked toward the kitchen table.

He would also have the extra money he was earning from Mr. Smith. "It's going to be a great Christmas," he said.

On the floor, where one tiny creature continued to stir, the giant teenager's comments reminded him of the approaching holiday. He had hoped to be on his way to his nephew's college before the school paused for the holiday break between semesters.

Now, the more pressing detail on his mind was thinking of a way to get Tommy's attention in order to get back his normal size and his life.

"I'm going to have to think things out better in the future," the shrunken man said aloud.

Meanwhile, Tommy looked around the kitchen. It looked like he had managed to tidy the accidental mess.

"I don't think Mr. Smith would have any cause for complaint," the huge teenager remarked aloud as he took a step that led him toward his bug-sized neighbor's spot on the kitchen floor.

For the petrified little man, his options dwindled to:
112122112112211112.title: Evading the stomp

choices: First bite is the worst
Waiting for the next bite
112122112112212.content:
Tommy hunched over Mr. Smith's vacuum cleaner, preparing to clean up the mess he had made in his neighbor's kitchen, when Joe strolled into the kitchen.

"Someone made a mess," Joe said, looking down toward the cookie bits scattered across the tiles.

"I'm cleaning it up," Tommy snapped irritably, attaching the vacuum cleaner's nozzle.

"Well, I think the 30-second rule applies here," Joe said when he spied one of the cookies that remained, more or less, intact.

"Gross," Tommy said. "You aren't gonna eat that!"

"It's not dirty," Joe said, shrugging off his friend's disgust.

"Besides, I think it's five-second rule," Tommy said.

"Whatever," Joe replied, taking a big bite from the cookie. He turned back to his buddy and, with crumbs spewing from his open mouth, grinned and said, "Tastes great!"

......

Everything happened in such a blur. The tiny man climbed the sloping surface of the cookie, finding the crumbly surface less than ideal.

He pressed ahead, knowing everything depended on getting Tommy's attention. In his haste, he plunged right into the soft, gooey spot where a melted chocolate chip was exposed at the surface of the cookie.

For an ordinary person, the chocolate chip was nothing more than a tasty morsel. To the shrunken scientist, it might as well have been a prehistoric tar pit, trapping him just as securely.

Still, he didn't panic until Tommy's huge friend appeared and shouted out the gleeful words "I THINK THE 30-SECOND RULE APPLIES HERE!"

Before he had time to make sense of Joe's statement, the young giant's hand reached down and picked the cookie off the floor even as the unseen tiny man struggled to free himself from the sticky chocolate chip.

Suddenly, the little man realized that getting free of the sticky trap was not his top priority.

Joe shoved the chocolate toward his open mouth. In shock, he realized the teen titan meant to eat the cookie and, by extension, him.

"Tommy!" Mr. Smith shrieked as Joe's huge teeth chomped down on the cookie. "Don't let him eat me!"
112122112112212.title: Joe enjoys a snack

choices: Put down the cookie and finish it after helping Tommy
Finish eating the cookie and then help clean
1121221121122122.content:
The tiny scientist screamed from the horror of being a helpless witness as teenage titan Joe shoved the enormous cookie into his toward his cavernous mouth.

His screams did him no more good than his feeble struggles to escape the sticky trap of the chocolate morsel baked into the cookie. He tried to get a handhold with his fingers on the pebbly surface of the cookie, but he could not get a grip sufficient enough to pull him from the gooey pool of sticky, melted chocolate.

He gave up trying to free himself and focused on attempting to gain the attention of one of the two titans. He managed to free one arm from the chocolate trap, and he waved in a desperate attempt to get one of the enormous teens to notice him.

Far from noticing the speck-sized man mired in a chocolate chip on the cookie, Joe brought his teeth together to rip a huge chunk from the tasty treat.

As he withdrew the rest of the cookie from his mouth, an avalanche of crumbs rained down.

Tiny Mr. Smith's brain had gone blank from sheer terror when Joe's huge teeth bit down literally only an inch from his location. He knew with fearful clarity that a second bite would not leave him so fortunate. Some of the crumbs produced from the titan's bite had rained down on the unlucky little man.

"Could you finish stuffing your face and help me clean?" Tommy grumbled at his friend.

"Tommy! No!" Mr. Smith shrieked, renewing his struggle to break free of the sticky chocolate. "Please, see me. Don't let him eat me!"

Tommy, still chewing and spewing crumbs, frowned. He decided to...
1121221121122122.title: Big Bite

choices: Mr. Smith hangs on
Mr. Smith gets washed down
11212211211221222.content:
Warned by Tommy's angry scowls, Joe reluctantly gave way to his friend's demand for a helping hand.

"Just let me get a class of milk to wash down this cookie, and I'll help you clean the house, OK?" Joe asked as he placed the half-eaten cookie on the kitchen countertop.

Without waiting for Tommy's reply or permission, the muscle-bound teenager walked over and yanked open the door of Mr. Smith's fridge.

He removed a plastic container of milk and retrieved a tall glass from the kitchen cabinets. He poured the milk into the glass, and then turned back toward his buddy.

"Don't just leave the milk on the counter!" Tommy snapped. "Gee, were you raised in a barn?"

Joe rolled his eyes, but put the milk back into the refrigerator.

-----

Unnoticed by the two teenaged titans, the shrunken scientist continued his struggle to free himself from the sticky embrace of a melted chocolate chip embedded in the half-eaten cookie, the same cookie now left on the kitchen countertop.

An increasingly panicked inner voice urged the tiny man to continue his struggle. If he could escape the pool of gooey chocolate, he could leap onto the countertop, putting some safe distance between himself and the hungry teenager.

"I've got to get out of here," he screamed, pushing himself through the chocolate sludge as best he could. He now knew what it must feel like for a bug fallen into amber.

Even as he fought to free himself, he raised his eyes to keep track of the movements of the giants. He saw Tommy's enormous friend take out a container of milk and pour himself a glass.

The tiny scientist knew that milk and cookies were a natural combination, and that any second Joe would be back to finish his snack.

"Tommy!" Mr. Smith screamed again. "Please, let him notice me."

At that moment, however, Tommy was too engaged in cleaning the last of the cookie crumbs from the kitchen floor. He knew that his neighbor and employer liked to keep his home neat and tidy.

Joe, in the meantime, held his glass of milk in one hand as he stretched out his other hand for the cookie.

-----

Having almost reached the edge of the pool of chocolate, Mr. Smith grasped at the cookie's coarse, crumbly surface, hoping to pull himself free from the trap. Before he managed to do so, he saw the titanic hand drop down and felt the cookie lifted.

------

Joe's first bite tore off another large section from the cookie. Chewing the fragment between his teeth, he raised the glass of milk.

------

Disoriented, the tiny speck of a man found himself thrown free of the chocolate pit by the force of Joe's bite. That also saved him from being immediately pulverized by the teen's enormous teeth. Instead, he landed in the mushy collection of chewed cookie on the youth's huge, muscular tongue.

------

Joe raised the glass of milk, ready to wash down the cookie. He opened wide, giving the terrified little man a perfect view of the oncoming glass. As the shrunken scientist watched, Joe tilted the glass, spilling a white flood of milk into his cavernous mouth.
11212211211221222.title: Milk does a body good

choices: He starts to couch so he drinks it
He dumps it down the drain
112122112112212221.content:
Mr. Smith held his breath as he was swept up in a tsunami of milk. His arms flailed for something to grab onto, anything! His fingertips felt something and Mr. Smith grabbed at it with his arms and held as tight as possible. He felt the last of the milk flow past and took a deep breath, before gagging on the stale air in the back of Joe's mouth.

Joe's lips parted as he breathed after swallowing, allowing some light to stream in. The tiny scientist quickly realized he was stuck to a small chunk of chocolate which itself was plastered against the arch leading into Joe's mouth. He could see a protruding tonsil nearby.

Looking towards the front of the mouth Mr. Smith could see the crushed remains of the cookie, light and dark brown swirled where it was compacted into Joe's massive molars. His front teeth hung from above, blocking his view outside the mouth. Smears of chocolate and small puddles of milk were spread across the undulating tongue. The scene while horrifying had an odd beauty and Mr. Smith knew he had a view that no one had ever seen before.

He then shook his head. Hanging over some teenage boy's throat looking at the inside of his mouth after eating was a view he could have done without no matter how unique!

---

"Are you done yet?" Tommy asked impatiently. Joe looked at the last piece of the cookie in his hand, held it in front of Tommy's face, and shook his head.

"Well you can clean the rest up, I got most of it!" Tommy snapped. He put the vacuum down, leaned against the counter, crossed his arms, and stared expectantly at Joe.

Tommy's pissy attitude annoyed Joe so he decided to make a show of his last bite.

Joe leaned towards Tommy and opened his mouth wide. His tongue slithered forward. Tommy could see strands of brown saliva stretching from the chocolate-smeared tongue up to the molars jammed with chewed cookie.

Tommy closed his eyes in disgust and shoved Joe's arm. Joe grinned as Tommy made him miss his mouth. Feeling satisfied he popped the last bite into his mouth and started to chew.

---

Mr. Smith kept calm and debated what he ought to do. He knew he needed to find a way out of Joe's mouth, he just didn't know how he would do it. He was still undecided when Joe started his show for Tommy. The opening of the mouth widened and Mr. Smith stared outwards where he could see Joe's hand holding the last bite. Beyond that he saw Tommy's annoyed face. The whole scene seemed unreal; from his perspective his teen neighbor almost looked normal if he ignored the fact he was watching from within a young man's mouth.

Mr. Smith frowned as the tongue flowed out of the mouth like water, tendrils of browned saliva stretching from the monstrous teeth down to the quivering tongue. Below him a thick layer of chocolate shone in the light that had been previously hidden on the slope in the throat. Finally Mr. Smith stopped taking in the scene and looked out at Tommy again.

"Tommy!" Help me please! I'm right here!" He watched Tommy close his eyes and push Joe's hand away and the tongue retreated into Joe's mouth empty. The tiny man's screams were swallowed up by the soft-walled, moist cavern. He felt a pang of disappointment and despair in his chest.

Joe's tongue sprung forward again as he successfully dropped the last bite of the cookie onto his tongue. The lips shut and Mr. Smith held tight as he heard the crunches signal the beginning of Joe chewing.

---

Joe chewed up the last bite and picked up his glass of milk. He swished the remaining milk in the glass and walked toward the sink.
112122112112212221.title: Sticking around

choices: Mr. Smith shot out of the mouth when Joe yelled
Mr. Smith ended up on Joe's hand when he coughed
1121221121122122212.content:
Joe dumps the remaining milk down the drain and places the cup into the sink .

"Rinse it" orders Tommy.

Joe rolls his eyes but complies. He turns around to see Tommy glaring at the mess on the floor. Joe leans down to finish cleaning.

---

As Joe dumps out the milk Mr. Smith listens to the chewing of the cookie become less crunch and more smush. He hears the pile of food approach him and with a slick squelch Joe swallows it down. Mr. Smith smiles wide as he realizes that he has survived two bites inside the massive teenager's mouth. Joe's lips stay agape as he cleans, letting light flood the interior. Mr. Smith can see blurs of the floor outside the mouth and he watches as the smears of cookie on the tongue and the smashed remains on the molars flow away as they're broken down by the saliva. As Joe finishes cleaning his mouth is already cleared of a lot of the remaining cookie. It is then that Mr. Smith realizes his own binds have loosened significantly.

---

Joe dumps the last of the mess into the trash.

"Done? Good" says Tommy.

Joe as had it. "Dude, what's your problem??" he snaps at Tommy.

Tommy looks surprised before his features soften into an apologetic look.

"Sorry," he begins "It's just that Mr. Smith paid me so much I don't want to screw anything up. I think he trusts me. I'm just a little paranoid, I guess I should loosen up," he says shrugging.

Joe grins. "Whatever dude, I guess you're just being a good person. Anyway I think the game's about to start," he replies with a glance at the TV.

Tommy nods and heads into the living room, with Joe right behind him.

As Joe plops into a recliner he coughs into his hand and then watches the commercials after Tommy gets to the right channel.
1121221121122122212.title: Moving On

choices: A huge hand suddenly appears
Bryan tries to climb
11212211211221222121.content:
Without warning, a huge force of air and sound burst from deep inside the giant teenager. Bryan's ears throbbed when the powerful voice rumbled his entire body. The massive gale of force that came shortly after picked Bryan up like a feather and flung his tiny body straight out of Joe's huge mouth.

He whipped around violently, flying through the air at break-neck speed until he roughly collided with a soft material. Completely covered in a thick film of revolting saliva, Bryan stuck fast to this new material. A heavy rhythmic beat could be felt, huge powerful thump thump, thump thump, every second.

A huge voice thundered from high above, causing Bryan to look up. His eyes still blurry from his most recent ordeal didn't stop him from realizing where he was. "Tommy! I'm on his shirt!" He cried.

Bryan was indeed no more than a tiny crumb stuck to his teenaged neighbor's massive t-shirt. The powerful rhythmic pounding was Tommy's heart, pumping enough blood to fill an entire ocean. Looking downwards, the tiny scientist was given a wave of vertigo as he realized just how high up he was. No skyscraper could match this height, which positively dizzied the tiny man.

"Help me, Tommy! HELP!" Bryan squealed as the realization of his predicament was setting in. Distant thuds rumbled his body as Tommy began walking.

This was his chance, he was closer to Tommy than he had ever been. He needed to act...
11212211211221222121.title: A tiny crumb

112122112112212222.content:
He flashed back to an early October evening 10 years past when he had been in the midst of a brief, scorching affair with a fellow bio-physics grad student.

The insanity of flashing back to a hot encounter in a janitor's supply closet after hours in the science building didn't lessen the intensity of the memory.

Why had he let the relationship burn out so quickly? Why had he been frightened to commit to exploring how far they could have gone? If he had established some ties with Paul, and settled down, avoiding his prolonged bachelorhood, would things have turned out differently?

Now, it was far too late.

-------

Joe, utterly unaware of the bug-sized man who had been mired in the chocolate chip in the center of his cookie, enjoyed the quenching coolness as the cold milk washed over his tongue and started its course down his throat.

As the white river of milk smashed into the pulverized paste of the cookie, the tiny man who had managed to avoid the same fate as the cookie between the teenager's gnashing teeth, tried to grab hold of a crumb.

Crumb and shrunken man were caught in the maelstrom of milk that swirled through Joe's cavernous mouth, draining far at the back, plunging like a cataract down the throat and into the youth's stomach.

The speck-sized man saw the approaching uvula, a huge pendulum of flesh hanging from the roof of Joe's mouth. Exhausted, he barely focused his strength on lifting his arms from the river of milk. His tiny fingers slid along the underside of the surface of the muscular uvula, but there was nothing to grasp.

Then, he felt the sensation of falling....

He wailed "Nooo!" as he passed the point of no return.

--------

After downing the bite of cookie with a swig of milk, Joe deftly finished off the final bite of the delicious cookie. He then drained the remaining milk in the tall glass and deposited the now empty container into Mr. Smith's sink.

"Rinse it out," Tommy ordered.

"Yes, sir," Joe said in a mocking tone. He ran the glass beneath the stream of water from the faucet.

His stomach grumbled and he felt a wave of nausea. "I don't feel so good," he said, rubbing his stomach beneath his tight T-shirt.

"I told you not to eat that cookie after it fell on the floor," Tommy replied without much sympathy.

Joe patted his stomach.

-------

Mr. Smith found himself on a mound of sludge, the remnants of the cookie. The milk flowed away, leaving him on the unsteady platform. He was still trying to accept this horror when another flood of milk smashed into the youth's massive stomach.

He survived being washed away into the sea of acids, but he knew he could not hold out much hope.

Then, he felt and heard an unusual sound. There was a thudding noise making its way through the walls of the stomach.

He didn't realize at first, but then he guessed that the teenager must be patting his stomach.

He let his hopes leap. Had Tommy figured it out? Did they know what had happened to him?

He fought his way through the sludge. "Tommy! Please! Get me out of here!"

--------

Joe complained again from the nausea. "Maybe you should go to the john and throw up," Tommy recommended. "Better out than in."

Joe frowned in distaste. Instead of heeding his friend's advice, he gave his gut a good punch, which produced a loud belch.

"Oh, nice," Tommy complained.

Joe smiled. "Worked! I feel much better now."

---------

There was another jolt from the outside to the huge stomach, followed by a definite change in pressure. But then, nothing changed. With resignation, as the cookie-mush raft began to dissolve, Bryan Smith realized there wasn't going to be a rescue.

It was way too late for that.
112122112112212222.title: Far Too Late

choices: Follow the giants to the living room
Wait for Tommy (please not Joe) to return to the kitchen
11212211211222.content:
Unaware as a speck-sized man dodged frantically to evade the incoming boulders of baked dough, Tommy groaned as he saw the mess his accident had produced.

"Screw it," Tommy said, looking down in dismay at the scattered cookie crumbs on Mr. Smith's otherwise spic-and-span floor. "I'll clean it up later."

On the floor, smaller than the crumbs scattered over the tiles, the tiny man reacted to the turn of events with a forced scientific detachment, trying not to let panic seize control of his actions. That hadn't been easy with the storm of crumbs, some as big as boulders, rained down around him.

Now, the initial disturbance was over, and the tiny man stood still and got his breathing under control. The entire time, he stared up at his colossal teenaged neighbor, completely in awe of Tommy's sheer size that left him feeling more bug than man.

But it was as a man, and one with a higher-than-average IQ, that he would get himself out of his self-inflicted dilemma. "Just have to stay calm," he whispered to himself even as every instinct urged him to run and hide himself in some dark cranny or crevice.

He gazed up wistfully at the enormous teenager. "If only I could get him to…"

THWUMP! THWUMP!

The shrunken scientist's hope was left unspoken when Tommy's equally enormous friend stomped back into the kitchen. The slap of the rubber soles of the pair of Airwalks sent frightening tremors through the floor under the bug-sized man's feet.

"What's taking you?" Joe asked with impatience, scanning the floor and noticing the mess. "What's that?"

"Never mind," Tommy snapped. "I can deal with it later."

The little man cowered near a boulder-sized crumb. It was too late to run. He prayed the enormous Airwalks, the very same shoes that had featured so explicitly in that bizarre dream, wouldn't stray any closer.

From his lowly perspective, the horrified little man watched, almost unable to comprehend this new reality, as the titanic teenagers stomped loudly and carelessly all around him. Even with his scientifically trained mind, the shrunken man could hardly accept how beings of such enormous size could move with such agility and speed.

THWOP!

One of the Airwalks, as big as an ocean-going vessel, slammed down mere inches from the debris field of cookie crumbs.

"Careful!" Tommy cautioned.

"Don't step on me!" The little man added in unheard desperation.

"What's the problem now?" Joe asked.

"I just don't want you stomping through all those crumbs and grinding them into the tiles on Mr. Smith's floor."

Joe laughed and raised up on tiptoes and pretended to walk carefully across the floor. "Is this better?"

Tommy just laughed at Joe's antics. "Let's just watch the game, OK?"

Joe didn't need to be asked twice and shot out of the room, providing the tiny man one last chance.

"Tommy!" He screamed as he fled the littered landscape of cookie boulders. "Down here! Please, help me!"

Once again, his tiny cries for help went unheard and unheeded. He watched Tommy's distant form recede through the monolithic door dividing the kitchen from the rest of the house.

"Why does it have to be so hard?" Mr. Smith whined in defeat. "I just need him to hear me and see me!"
11212211211222.title: Tommy decides he can clean up the mess later

choices: Tommy drinks
Tommy returns to watching the game
11212211212.content:
The tiny man lost his nerve. With the two giants roaming free in his living room, Bryan lacked the nerve to attempt again to contact them. He told himself he could wait for a better opportunity.

As Tommy and Joe settled into the massive living room furniture, they became engrossed in the game. As they became more comfortable, Bryan decided his next move. By leaving the shelter of the fake plant, he could climb the back of the sofa. Closer to Tommy's massive head, the tiny researcher felt sure he could successfully contact the young man and enlist his help in resolving his sizable dilemma.

The climb required more energy and effort than Bryan expected. The entire climb, he remained acutely aware of Tommy's huge body. Whenever the game provided unexpected action on the screen, the giant body would shift in excitement, which forced Bryan to cling to the sofa fabric to prevent being thrown off.

"I'm getting thirsty," Joe announced. "Want a drink?"

"Sure," Tommy answered.

Joe left the living room to fetch some drinks from the kitchen.

Bryan found himself within inches of Tommy's shoulders. He took a deep breath and leaped onto the giant's body. He braced himself on the slope of Tommy's right shoulder. He debated what to do next and decided to get closer to scream in the youth's ear.

At just that moment, however, Joe returned. He held two huge mugs in his hand. "I'm sure your boss won't miss a couple of beers," Joe said as he held out one of the mugs to his friend.

Tommy leaned forward to take the drink, which caused Bryan to lose his footing. His fall ended with an unanticipated splash.

"Where am I?" Bryan cried as he surfaced in a vast amber-colored pool surrounded by a smooth wall of glass. "Oh no!"
11212211212.title: Bryan decides to await a better opportunity

choices: Tommy takes a big gulp
Tommy sloshes some beer out of the glass
112122112122.content:
In a more relaxed moment, without having to face the prospect of being swallowed alive at any moment, the shrunken research scientist might have reflected on the irony of his situation.

First, Joe had helped himself to two bottles of beer, courtesy of the tiny man's own well-stocked fridge.

Second, that same teenager had poured the purloined beers into two mugs that he had found in the bug-sized man's own cabinets.

Third, the two teenagers had made themselves quite comfortable in the little guy's living room, their gigantic bodies resting on his sofa and an matching armchair as they watched a game on his own big-screen television set.

After landing with a splash in the ice-cold beer, the little man struggled to tread water, well, beer in this case, as the chilly liquid began to cramp his muscles. He swam to the curved wall of frosty glass and tried in desperation to climb out of the enormous mug. The slippery walls proved impossible to climb.

"I've got to get Tommy's attention" Bryan realized.

So far, the titanic teenager had been more interested in keeping track of the game than taking a drink of beer.

That stroke of luck might not prevail much longer.

"Tom- Tommy!" The tiny man screamed. His lips had gone blue from the cold, and his teeth chattered. "He-help me! It's me! Mr. Smith! Here in your drink!"

As he gazed out of the oval opening in the glass, he saw Tommy hand hover over the glass and let himself dare to hope that his pleas for help had been heard.

Instead, Tommy wrapped his fingers around the mug and lifted the frosty glass toward his face.

"Oh no!" His tiny neighbor cried. "No! Please, don't swallow me!"
112122112122.title: In Tommy's Glass

choices: Tommy and Joe argue
Tommy pays closer attention to his drink
1121221121221.content:
Tommy tilted the frosty mug back toward his open mouth, releasing a torrent of beer that spilled past his lips, over his teeth and into a steady stream that dropped down his throat.

When the mug came back to rest, the tiny man trapped in the huge glass found himself tossed to and fro by the waves created by Tommy's simple actions of lifting and then putting down the mug.

The tiny man also realized he was fortunate not to have been sucked down the colossal teenager's throat. However. the slippery glass walls of the mug now rose up even higher around him.

"Tommy!" He shouted. "Please! Here! In your glass."

At the same time, Joe's channel surfing landed him on a momentous scene in a fun movie the youths recalled.

"Isn't that the shrinking movie with those kids?" Tommy asked.

"Yeah," Joe said, as he watched Professor Szalinski lift the spoon that contained a lot of Cheerios and one speck-sized son.

"Man, that just ruins it every time," Joe complained.

"Ruins it?" Tommy asked. "What do you mean?"

"I was always rooting for the dad to swallow the little, whiney runt," Joe answered.

"That's harsh, man," Tommy said as he lifted the mug for another drink of beer.

Joe finally zapped back to a sports channel. "Who would ever know?"

"But, the kid, he was still a person," Tommy argued. "Just a tiny one. You can't just swallow people!"
1121221121221.title: Big gulp

11212211212211.content:
Tiny Mr. Smith struggled to stay afloat in the mammoth mug. The cold liquid numbed the shrunken scientist's tiny body.

He had survived the teenager's first thirsty gulps of beer from the mug, but in those few seconds when it had looked like he might flow right into Tommy's cavernous mouth, the bug-sized scientist had screamed wordlessly in his desperate panic.

Now, Tommy and his equally huge friend were watching a movie, a film that had always been a particular favorite of Mr. Smith's.

Now, living out his own shrunken misadventure, the scientist, realized the kids in the film had had it better than they realized. At least no oblivious teenager had tried to swallow them with illicitly obtained beer.

The boys, in the meantime, continued to argue about the hypothetical morality of swallowing a tiny person.

"I can't believe you wanted their professor dad to swallow them," Tommy said.

"It's just a movie," Joe said, getting bored of defending himself from one offhand remark.

"Well, think of it from their point of view," Tommy said. "Think of how scary it would be!"

At the same time, his own tiny neighbor remained confined in the lake of amber-colored beer contained in the reservoir-sized mug.

When Joe changed the channel and they got into the game, thoughts of tiny people wandering in a hostile backyard faded.

Tommy reached for his mug, ready to drain it and perhaps go back for a refill.

As the beer swayed and sloshed in the enormous glass container, Mr. Smith resumed his pitiful screams to get his teenaged neighbor's attention.

"Tommy, please," he shouted. "It's me! I've shrunk!"

He took another drink, drawing in almost half of the remaining beer. The amber-tinted liquid flowed over his lips and teeth, directly toward the back of his throat.

Mr. Smith's mind went blank with terror, but he was spared again.

Tommy put down the mug and excused himself to find something for a snack.

After he left, Joe took something from his pocket and reached his hand over the mug. Below, a spluttering tiny man screamed for help.

As speck-sized Mr. Smith tried to swim in the lake of beer, he saw Joe's huge hand.

"Help me!" He shouted. "Help..."

His shouts cut off when Joe dropped something. With a splash, a capsule about twice his size fell into the beer, tossing up more ripples.

"What the hell?" Mr. Smith wondered.

Tommy returned with a bag of chips, oblivious to his friend's tampering of his drink.

Having already eaten a handful of chips, he reached for the mug to wash them down.

The tiny scientist knew how much of the beer had been removed from the mug. One last gulp remained. He had to get Tommy's attention.

Everything flowed toward the cavernous mouth as Tommy tilted the mug.

As Mr. Smith flowed out of the huge glass, he screamed one final "Help meeeee!"

Joe watched everything with restrained anticipation. Tommy drained the remaining beer in one gulp and then licked his lips.

At that moment, Joe burst out laughing.

"You did it! Congrats, buddy. You drank a tiny person!"

Tommy looked at Joe as if he was crazy. "What the hell are you going on about, you moron?"

"I put a pill in your drink," he said. Joe explained that the pill would have been the size of a tiny, shrunken person. "And you swallowed it right down."

"But a pill's still not a person!"

"Doesn't matter," Joe said in triumph. "You didn't even notice. So, why the fuck would you ever notice a tiny person in your drink?"

Tommy didn't have a good answer, but his buddy's smugness irritated him.

"I think I'd notice a tiny person in my drink," he said defensively.

Tommy felt a little sick, too. "What sort of pill?"

"Relax. It was just an aspirin."

"You're such a moron!"

As the boys fell back into prickly back-and-forth, no one even suspected the ongoing demise of a brilliant scientist who had just been swallowed with a few ounces of cheap beer by a clueless teenager.
11212211212211.title: Winning the argument

choices: Mr. Smith tumbled into his lap
Mr. Smith tumbled to the floor
1121221121222.content:
Every casual movement on Tommy's part had enormous repercussions for his shrunken neighbor.

Still gazing up at the enormous teenager from deep within the glass, his tiny body nearly numbed to the core by the frigid liquid, tiny Mr. Smith tried to call for help.

Instead of hearing, Tommy lifted the glass toward his lips, causing a maelstrom as the contents inside the glass sloshed and splashed against the smooth walls of the glass.

"Oh, please no," tiny Mr. Smith begged. "Please, don't swallow me!"

There was nothing he could do to prevent his fate. Reduced to such insignificant, even a skinny teenager like his next-door neighbor held the ultimate power over the tiny man.

But, as he lifted the glass, some of the liquid contents rose in a large wave and sloshed over the side.

Tommy took little notice as a splash of his drink dampened the front of his shirt. Had he been a little more observant, he might have seen the bug-sized man that was sloshed out of the glass and onto his shirt.

Unfortunately, he wasn't observant and...
1121221121222.title: Sloshed

choices: Tommy stands, Bryan tumbles
Scaling Mount Tommy
11212211212221.content:
Tommy lifted the glass mug, but as he did so, one of the players on the screen fumbled the ball, allowing Tommy's favorite team to recover the ball and drive down the field.

"Yes!" Tommy exclaimed, whipping the mug through the air as he reacted to the unexpected development on screen.

His action caused some of the beer nabbed from Mr. Smith's fridge to slosh out of the glass and soak the front of his blue T-shirt.

Had the teenager been a little more observant, he might have noticed his speck-sized neighbor riding the wave of beer out of the glass... and onto his shirt.

The tiny man observed everything, but it was all happening so fast. As the beer soaked into the vast swath of blue fabric, he began tumbling along the landscape of Tommy's chest and stomach. He screamed wordlessly as he fell.

"That was a great play," Tommy remarked to Joe. "They're back in the game now."

Joe, dressed in baggy shorts and Airwalk sneakers but no socks, agreed. "And it's so cool getting to watch the game on this awesome TV!"

The conversation slipped past tiny Mr. Smith, who landed with a bit of a bounce in Tommy's lap. The bug-sized scientist fell flat on his face on the enormous plain of denim fabric. As he pushed himself away from the rough surface, he realized he had fallen into Tommy's lap and was now resting on the field of denim covering the teenager's crotch.

As long as the enormous teenager remained seated, he could begin to slowly make his way across the uneven denim surface.

He did need a moment to recover from the chill of his time swimming in the cold beer. He shuddered as he recalled how close Tommy had come to gulping him down.

"I'm going to have to be more careful," he admonished himself. A single careless moment could have enormous consequences.

Starting toward the towering cliff of blue fabric represented by the teenager's T-shirt, he realized his best option would be to try to climb toward Tommy's face. With a bit of luck, he could yell in the teenager's ear or get close enough for Tommy to see... and recognize ... him.
11212211212221.title: In Tommy's lap

choices: After watching some television, Tommy decides to head home
After watching some television, Tommy heads to his girlfriend's home
112122112122211.content:
The tiny professor's jubilation at having avoided being swallowed by his colossal neighbor was tempered by a cold, hard realization.

"I've got to be more careful," he admitted to himself. One careless instant on Tommy's part could lead to disastrous consequences for the bug-sized man.

After falling, literally, onto Tommy's lap, the shrunken man knew he needed to act fast to get the teenager's attention.

Walking along the hard surface formed by the denim jeans, the tiny man was trying to determine the best route for scaling Tommy's T-shirt when the teenaged titan decided to move.

For the speck of a man, it was the worst possible timing. As Tommy stood, the little man began falling away from the T-shirt covered torso and toward the abyss, hurtling headlong toward his probably demise.

"No, Tommy," he managed to scream as he fell.

He expected the fall to be like plunging over a cliff, but the drop was cut short when he fell deep into a dark cavern. The impact left him stunned. As he crawled over the floor of the cavern, he realized he was still an insect on a vast field of denim.

"But why's it so dark?" The tiny man squeaked aloud.

Then, the answer came to him— he had fallen into the pocket of Tommy's jeans. He was more trapped than ever. He tried to scale the denim cliffs, but the pit of the pocket was simply too deep.

"Tommy!" The little man screamed in mounting desperation. "Here! I'm in your pocket! Please, help me!"
112122112122211.title: Bryan takes a tumble

choices: Tommy and Jessica go out
Jessica's brother sees something tiny on the floor
1121221121222112.content:
The humiliation of being trapped in a teenager's pocket wasn't lost on the tiny man. Unable to even win his freedom from something as simple as a denim pocket helped put into perspective just how helpless and tiny his actions had left him.

He didn't even know where his teenaged neighbor was taking him. He could guess that Tommy had gone for a drive, but he hadn't a clue to the teenager's destination. The bug-sized man could only sit and wait, hoping that his young neighbor might eventually discover him and help him.

When Tommy showed up unexpectedly at his girlfriend's home, her reaction left a lot to be desired.

"You should have called first," she said.

"Why's that?" Tommy asked.

"My brother's home from college with some of his buddies," she said.

"So, let's just go up to your room," Tommy said hopefully.

"Not with him here!" Jessica said, scandalized.

Tommy gave her a hug, and she slid her hands into the front pockets of his jeans. He didn't complain, at all, finding he liked her hands there.

But when her brother walked in, Jessica pulled her hands away and pushed him back.

"Oh, hey, Tommy," her brother said. He was a tall, athletic guy. He played on the soccer team at college and arrived home with three of his teammates.

"So, you're still putting up with Jessica?" Her brother asked Tommy.

Tommy just laughed and answered that he had learned to cope with her. An aggravated Jessica wiped her hands on her own shorts, not noticing when something tiny fell from her fingers and landed on the distant floor.
1121221121222112.title: At Jessica's home

choices: Bryan accidentally falls into the plate of food.
Bryan snags the piece of hot wing and runs to safety.
1121221122.content:
“OOOOOH—MY—GOD!” Bryan spoke slowly and nervously as he watched the giants enter the living room. “They’re so fucking huge!”

Tommy led the way to the living room, followed by Joe and two of their friends. Andy and Steve were quick to notice the huge plasma screen television. Bryan could only gasp and look on helplessly as the jumbo sized teens took control of his living room. He began to back up cowardly as they moved in closer.

“Awesome!” Andy announced his approval as he checked out the latest technology in home entertainment. His finger searched for and found the power on button. “This is too cool.”

Each teen carried a 44 ounce Super-gulp from Seven Eleven. In addition, Joe lugged a plastic bag with chips, dip, and several orders of hot wings they had picked up from Pizza Hut on the way. He dumped the contents out onto the coffee table. “Hey, we need some plates.”

“I’ll grab some from the kitchen,” Tommy replied, and headed for the kitchen. "Turn the Piston’s game on Joe.”

Andy plopped down in the comfortable leather recliner and set his Super-gulp on the end table. “Man, this is an awesome place to watch the game.”

* * *

Bryan screamed in horror as a cup the size of a skyscraper came crashing down on top of him. He began to run for his life, slipping several times on the slippery glass tabletop. A powerful “BOOM” sent thunderous vibrations throughout the table as the giant cup of soda landed. Bryan fell to his knees with the crash, and looked up, trembling. He had been spared. “That was too fucking close!”

* * *

Having found some paper plates in the kitchen, Tommy threw them down on the glass coffee table. “Everybody help themselves.” He took a plate for himself and loaded it with some chips and hot wings. He sat on the floor while Joe and Steve took their place on the couch.

“Fuckin awesome dunk!” Andy yelled with excitement as the guys watched the NBA game that had just started. “Hand me some potato chips.”

The hungry teens gobbled up the snacks like they hadn’t eaten for days. Andy loaded a plate with food and set it down next to his soda.

* * *

The plate of giant food mesmerized the shrunken scientist. The hot wings looked to be about ten times bigger than he was. Watching Andy consume one of these gigantic wings so quickly sent a shiver down his tiny spine. As curiosity got the best of him, Bryan cautiously approached the giant plate of food.

Bryan couldn’t help but notice a small piece of meat from a hot wing hung precariously right on the edge of the paper plate. It looked delicious, and Bryan was beginning to get a little hungry. He walked even closer to the arena sized plate.

“If I jump, I think I can just get it,” Bryan thought to himself as he noticed Andy was preoccupied for the moment watching the basketball game. The tiny man crouched down and then jumped as high as he could to the edge of the paper plate in an effort to snag the dangling piece of meat.
1121221122.title: Watching the Game

choices: Putting the chips to the dip
Andy drops his plate
11212211221.content:
As he leaped forward, Bryan reached for the strip of meat dangling from the mostly-consumed chicken wing.

His stint of bad luck, however, continued unabated when his hands slipped as he tried to grasp the slick, greasy meat. His balance impaired, the tiny man tumbled off the rim of the plate and fell forward.

Before he could scramble to his feet, Bryan felt the landscape shift as a titanic hand lifted the plate.

••••••

"GIVE ME THAT DIP!" Andy said. The teen wanted some dip and chips to munch while watching the game with his buddies.

Bryan looked skyward and saw the colossal teen use an enormous spoon to scoop an enormous amount of dip from a round plastic container.

"No!" Bryan shouted and tried to run.

A stray drop of dip spilled off the spoon and smashed into the fleeing scientist. The impact knocked Bryan off his feet.

Looking up, he saw the rest of the dip fall free from the spoon. The scoop of dip plopped down on top of the shrunken scientist.

Matters could have gone even more badly, but Bryan escaped the worst of the dip the teen spooned onto his plate. Still, the speck-sized man found himself mired in the thick dip. He tried to push his way forward. "I've got to get off this plate!" Bryan realized quite urgently.

Andy tried to balance the plate on his lap as he used one hand to dig into a huge bag of chips.
11212211221.title: On Andy's Plate

choices: ...landed on Andy's pants next to a gigantic metal zipper
...landed on the floor next to his gigantic sneakers
112122112211.content:
A huge chip came down into the gooey mound of dip that Andy put on his plate. Bryan tried to run up to the rim of the paper plate but it was an uphill battle--one he lost, because he came tumbling down toward the hill of French Onion dip. To his horror, the next thing Bryan knew there was a thick potato chip under him. He had been scooped up along with the dip and was headed for Andy's mouth!

Suddenly the chip stopped in mid-air. "Got any napkins?," asked Andy. "I just spilled some dip on my pants."

Bryan tried not to look down but he couldn't help it--the chip was directly over the cup of Pepsi. It was 44 ounces of soft drink and ice but it may as well have been a lake to Bryan.
The chip tipped a bit to its side and Bryan held on to the ridges, but it was no use. He fell hundreds of feet into the cold drink.

The good news was that whatever dip or chicken wing grease that had soaked his clothes was now being washed out. The bad news was that he was now in a sea of Pepsi, with mini-icebergs of
ice cubes surrounding him. The Arctic Ocean would have felt warmer to him.

The bubbles of carbonated soda rushed all around him. He tried to climb onto an ice cube but just as he did, a bubble collided with him an pushed away. Far above, he saw Andy's mouth getting closer. Lips that seemed a hundred feet wide
and some teeth behind them that could easily pierce him, if he didn't get swallowed with the liquid first.

The cup was being tilted so Andy could drink but--wait, there was the edge of it!If he swam fast he could get out. It would be a long drop but it was his only hope.

The bubbles actually helped him out this time.
As the cup tipped, they pushed Bryan forward like an invisible engine. He went over the lip of the cup and fell down, like someone going over Niagara Falls in a barrel. Only this was an ever greater distance. He fell down and...
112122112211.title: Carbonated Hell

choices: Bryan decides to start climbing..
Contact with that huge thing!? There has to be another way...
1121221122112.content:
Bryan's hair parted where a stimulated wind was smashing into him strongly. Constantly, he tumbled through the air, doing unconscious flips like a gymnast. The force of the air he was falling through was mighty and Bryan felt like his movement was rough and interupted over and over again.

Bryan's scientific mind worked even as the ground rushed up at him. Because he was so small, he wasn't falling right through the air, he was sort of falling *over* it. Like somebody falling down steps, Bryan tumbled and fell and regained his footing as he fell through the air. It was nauseating, but slower than falling at average height; Bryan knew he would survive.

He had his eyes shut to reduce the pressure of the wind against his eyes, but he opened them for a minute. He was greatly surprised: He saw a gargantuan white cruise ship in a concrete sea.

Then, Bryan made the connection. He was going to land on Andy's shoe.

He made contact with the Adidas sneaker softly, considering what the fall had been in proportion to an average fall. He lay there, silent, trying to recover from the shock of his life. He had just experienced what was equivalent to a more a thousand foot drop. The wind was knocked out of him.

Suddenly, the ground beneath him began to shift. It was a rugged white landscape, with huge wall-thick ropes latched all over. Behind him, the tongue of the shoe loomed like a mountain. Bryan couldn't believe that this new "world" he was on was just a guy's shoe. He was struck with a miserable lack of self-esteem: Here he was, the size of a gnat, clinging to some random teenager's (who had become a god) shoe (which was also bigger than the block Bryan's house was on). Andy might think he was some meaningless bug and kill him for fun, under his foot. Bryan felt so humiliated and humbled.

The shoe shifted only a couple of inches, but it was enough to throw Bryan off his legs. He thought he had hurt his leg; it hurt.

Bryan looked at the tongue of the shoe, which seemed to be a mountain. But above it, Andy's jeans hung like a beanstalk to the clouds. But it wasn't the clouds: it would only lead to his thigh. Above that, was Andy's torso and head. He couldn't believe how huge Andy was. It was completely incomprehensible.

He would have to climb it, he realized. To get his attention, he would have to get to Andy. He hoped he would just stay still.
1121221122112.title: The Landing.

choices: Tommy looks for something to smash the bug with.
Tommy decides to stomp the bug with his shoe.
11212211221122.content:
Anywhere on the floor near these mammoth teenagers’ feet was the last place Bryan wanted to be. But there he was, literally on one of the giant guy’s shoes. A giant that could effortlessly take him to his kitchen table and the precious antidote—or just as easily crush him like a tiny bug under his whopper of a shoe.

Bryan looked skyward and figured it would be nearly a 400 foot climb just to Andy’s knee. The sixty foot drop to the hardwood floor below seemed the more practical alternative. Then Bryan could find a place to hide, and plan his next course of action.

The bug sized scientist found some stitching that led downward and began his descent. He only hoped Andy wouldn’t make any sudden movements. He climbed down as far as the stitching would take him, and then let himself drop to the floor.

Bryan could only look on in awe at the colossal sneaker. The tiny man realized he needed to quickly find a place to hide, away from these giant teens and their monstrous feet. Bryan quickly scanned the room, and surmised the best hiding spot would be under the stand that held the plasma television. He would be out of site, but would also have an unobstructed view of the entire living room. The only problem was that while getting there, he would be defenseless, in the open and in plain view of the giant teenagers.

Bryan hoped that at his reduced size, if he was really quick, he could make it to the television stand without being detected. He took a few deep breaths, and began to run.

Tommy and his friends continued downing their snacks, oblivious to the quarter inch tall man running across the living room floor.

“This place is awesome,” Andy garbled with his mouth half full of food. “Can we come here and watch the game tomorrow night too?”

“I guess there wouldn’t be any problem with that. I am supposed to watch the place,” Tommy responded. “But we need to clean up really good when we’re done.”

Filled with fear, Bryan continued running as fast as he could for the cover of the television stand. The thunderous voices and movements of the colossal teens behind him were unnerving, but the miniature man dared not look back.

“Look at that,” Joe alerted the other guys as he happened to glance down. “There’s a little bug running across the floor.”

“Oh man,” Tommy responded a little concerned. “Mr. Smith would freak out if he knew he had bugs in here.”
11212211221122.title: Running for Cover

choices: Tommy is ready to kill the bug...
Tommy wants a closer look...
112122112211221.content:
"Smash it, dude," Joe said to Tommy.

Tommy glanced down at the bug and was about to, when his gaze landed on his new sneakers, still perfectly white. "Man, I don't want to ruin my kicks. I'll get it with something else."

Tommy briefly crossed into the kitchen and returned with a small shot glass. "Here," he said, getting down on his knees to further inspect the bug. "I'll put it in here and get rid of it. That way I won't get bug guts over anything."

"Whatever you say, dude," Joe said, turning his attention back to his food.

* * *

Bryan nearly halted in a mixture of pure awe and terror as Tommy bent on one knee. His body was immensely long when he was standing up, but when he crouched, Tommy's body compacted into what looked like a titanic mountain. Even his new shoes looked like collossal whitewashed structures themselves.

It was nearly a second before Bryan realized why Tommy was bending down: to kill him.

Bryan took off as far in the other direction as he could, but he felt a huge force strike him from behind. He flew off his feet and landed on the hardwood panel and skid three inches. The "force," Bryan figured out, as he pulled himself up, had been the displacement of air by Tommy's approaching hand. Bryan intended to use that principle again, but Tommy's hand did just that: approached. Too quickly.

The shot glass swooped parallel to the ground, just hitting Bryan. As Tommy righted it, Bryan felt a change of senses and confusion as his world channged directions. He fell all the way into the bottom of the glass.

Bryan looked up, terrified, but the glass walls were both smooth and incredibly high. He realized he completely at Tommy's mercy.
112122112211221.title: Bryan Got Shot

choices: Tommy goes through with it
Tommy chickens out
1121221122112211.content:
Tommy didn't really care for bugs, and even less for their guts. His original intention had been to catch the bug in the glass and then wash it down the sink, a plan he was about to enact when one of he other boys in the group looked at the glass and Tommy and got a very interesting idea. He shoved his hand into his pocket for a moment, gathering the vestiges of his idea and weaving them into a coherent thought that he could express. Pulling out a wad of bills, mostly ones considering he was a college student, he pulled out one with the number five on it.

"Five bucks says you won't drink a shot of real bug juice," he said, catching Tommy's arm and turning him around to stare at the note.
_________________________
By this time Bryan had recovered from his shocking new environment and was screaming his head off trying to get the attention of the giant, who was at that time intent on his demise, and not really paying too much attention to the man trapped in the glass. When Bryan heard the proposal that one of his friends was making, Bryan made a higher pitched scream for help. He had almost been ingested once today, and that was more than enough for him.
_________________________
Up above him, and oblivious to the shouts from inside the shot glass, Tommy was considering this bet. H really didn't want to drink the little bug, after all it was not exactly healthy to drink a bug, but five bucks was five bucks, and he was pretty sure if he refused the others might just make fun of him. Not one to ignore peer pressure or turn down good money Tommy looked around. Finding his own cup easy he dumped a small amount of soda into the shot glass and watched the little bug bob to the surface. The others looked on expectantly.
________________________
Bryan was much less than happy with the current line of events. This had all sounded so simple when he had thought it up, and now here he was, in a shot glass full of soda, about to become the center point of a bet for five dollars. Considering his self-worth he considered that Tommy was getting jiped. He should have asked the other guys to each chip in five bucks too. At that instant his thoughts turned back to his immediate problem as Tommy's already massive face approached, growing more massive. His mouth hung open like some cavern of death, threatening to engulf him.
1121221122112211.title: A bet regardding a bug in a glass

choices: He lands on  something soft
He lands in liquid
11212211221122111.content:
The threat was carried out in short order, and Bryan found himself riding a wave of carbonated beverage right into Tommy's mouth. The air was foul with the scent of saliva, hot wing, and soda all mixed together, and Bryan had to focus his will on not adding vomit into the odd mixture, while at the same time swimming against the flow of soda that was trying to drag him down the precipice that was at the back of the cavern.

The swim wasn't easy, the current being what it was, but with a force of effort, and a lucky bump against a molar Bryan was able to fight it and watched as the flood washed down the back of Tommy's throat, creating a splashing sound as it hit the stomach acid. Or at least he thought he could hear it. It might have just been a mental illusion created by the stress of his current situation.

At that instant he realizes that he will become a belch in Tommy's next conversation if nothing changes at all in the next few seconds.
