Large colds of dirt lay around him, a tree sized blade of grass lay before him, and beyond this stretched the endless expanse that was this teenager's room.

The shrunken man needed to decide on a course of action. He couldn't remain amongst the unnoticed dirt left behind from Trent's huge sneakers. Bryan looked around, weighing the options presented before him.

"There is no way I could realistically climb anything in here..." His eyes drifting from the gargantuan shape of the bed, to a cluttered nightstand next to it. Bryan bit his lip and groaned pitifully. He needed help!

His watery eyes settled on the door. Huge, and ominous looking, light from the hall glowed in to the dim bedroom. "I have got to get him...Trent, to notice me!" Was Bryan's determined thought.

It would be an exercise in futility to make his stand here amongst all the garbage here. Bryan began trekking towards the looming door. He loathed the idea of encountering the massive athletic giant again, but what choice did he have?

The journey went quickly, but felt much longer, and left him wheezing from exertion. Bryan was able to freely pass beneath the humongous door. The usually small space was many times his height. Goosebumps prickled his skin when he saw this new environment. High above, the ceiling arched like some great cathedral. The hall spanned almost endlessly in each direction, ending far to his right with a bare wall, and nearer to his left with a staircase banister.

Bryan watched a house fly buzz lazily high above when a loud disturbance caught his attention. A distant gurgling flush was heard, soon followed by heavy, reverberating steps from behind a door almost directly across the hall. Bryan fluttered in terror at the sight of two large shadows visible under the door. The impossibly huge door was pulled open fluidly, revealing Trent's titanic form towering over him, his large high tops planted firmly.

No time was wasted as Bryan jumped up and down, arms flapping. It was all for not, as the huge young guy was looking at his cellphone, a smirk on his oblivious face.

The brief quiet before the storm ended, and Trent was on the move. A huge Nike Air Force high top slammed down with thunderous result. Bug-sized Bryan was promptly flung to the ground, left only to watch as the second sneaker crashed down with equal power that caused the ground to shudder. Each step away from the tiny, unseen man presented a brief view of the giant sneaker sole, still crammed with mud, grass, and what could of been insects.
Terrified, and desolate, Bryan watched the gigantic teenager stomp down the hall to the crest of the stairs. Trent only then paused his fixation with the cellphone to bound thunderously down the stairs.

Bryan stood himself up on trembling legs. How could he hope to get any recognition from this enormous youth? He was larger than Tommy, who had already been godlike to little Bryan. Bryan was working on less than a wing and a prayer, he would need an outright miracle.

Unfortunately, this young guy, Trent, still remained his only hope.
112122112211221112211211112111221.title: Pursuit

choices: Something happens
Continued exploring
112122112211221112211211112111222.content:
The scene was surreal. Here he was--tinier than most ants--stranded in the bedroom of an unknown teenaged basketball jock.

His head was still in a whirl from the terrifying journey that brought him here. Cuts, bruises, and sore limbs afflicted the tiny scientist.Though none of these physical injuries stood up to the severe emotional toll that threatened to overload his genius mind at the moment. Tommy, his beloved neighbour and helper, had inadvertently caused all his misfortune. The youth carelessly invited his friends over to Mr. Smith's home, allowing them to run rampant throughout the pristine living room. Tommy then collected him in a glass and transported him to an abandoned lot under the guise of mercy.

"Hardly a merciful gesture!" Bryan muttered indignantly while rubbing his bruised shoulder. He couldn't stop himself from placing the blame on Tommy. "How the hell could he mistake me for an insect? He looked right at me!" Grumbling, the memories continued.

It had been like being dropped into a prehistoric nightmare. Huge plants, arid landscapes, and worst of all: gigantic insects! Limping to a pebble--large enough to sit upon--he settled himself down. After his most recent trauma, this reprieve was the only thing keeping him sane. Large clods of dirt, boulders, shreds of grass, and other unidentifiable debris lay scattered around him--shaken loose from the giant's sneakers like himself.

Bryan's nose twitched in reaction to a strong smell that seemed to permeate his small form. Sniffling, it was unmistakable: sweat. He turned to the source.

"Eurgh, fuck!" A sloping mountain of moist white fabric lay where the huge teenager had dropped it. It looked more like somebody had uprooted an entire mountain than a regular T-shirt.

Everything about the enormous room held similar fascination: The bed that loomed far away, unmade with more laundry strewn over it. A white dresser stood high and mighty next to it, scuffs, scratches, and a variety of branded stickers attesting to the athletic owner. Bryan couldn't take enough of the gargantuan space in. It was so huge. More discarded laundry lay in wrinkled heaps, looking more like oddly-coloured terrain than clothing. A closet door was slightly ajar. Jackets and baseball caps were hung carelessly on it, including a lettermans jacket with Tommy's highschool logo. On the floor, a basketball that resembled a grounded planet lay near the bed. Feeling slightly recovered, the tiny man decided to explore this strange and exotic space.

For once, the fact that Bryan's presence was unknown actually made him excited. It was enthralling to be alone in the bedroom of this young athletic guy.

The floor was really in desperate need of sweeping, he noted wordlessly. He was smaller than most of the dirty grit and crumbs spread across the floor. Larger than a battleship towered an empty can of Mountain Dew, half-crushed. This filth naturally attracted other uninvited life-forms. Bryan shied away from two ants that scuttled by carrying their ill-gotten crumbs. The two insects encountered another ant carrying a small white egg that altered course and followed them, vanishing from sight around the fold of a discarded sock. An entire world existed in this room. A world unknown to the giant teenager that occupied the room unaware of what he shared it with.

He stepped through a cavern made by a gum wrapper and passing fallen change that would out-size most buildings. "Damn, this kid really needs to pick up his crap..." The minuscule explorer thought out loud.

Amidst the flattened remains of a chip, Bryan discovered a seemingly edible crumb. Unlike most of the crumbs, this one was nicely sized no larger than his hand and un-hardened. He wondered at it momentarily. His usually finicky and "organic" diet made him debate the crumb's qualities.

He ate it all the same and felt better for it.

The musky scent given off the dirty clothing both disgusted and revolted Bryan, who held his nostrils shut. He found that the disposed socks were the worst in terms of smell and tried to avoid them as best he could. The off-white dresser loomed close at hand, dark scuffs and marks becoming plain to his curious eyes. The sleeve of a shirt hung from the top drawer; so high up that Bryan began to feel dizzy. Underneath was an abyss of darkness cluttered with more garbage and forgotten items. Humongous balls of dust were collected underneath and around the base.

Next to the sticker-covered dresser was the closet door, slightly ajar.

Bryan craned his neck back and squinted curiously. It seemed an interesting--not to mention forbidden--realm that would hold more oddities for him to explore at his diminished size. He tried to comprehend the astronomically huge door being easily opened by Trent. It was difficult for him to connect this tremendous space with anything in reality. Such thoughts seemed impossible, especially that a regular teenager lived and interacted with this mountainous environment.

Considering this, Bryan continued...
112122112211221112211211112111222.title: A teenager's room

choices: Bryan bolts
Bryan doesn't move
1121221122112211122112111121112221.content:
Bryan was still gaping at the towering closet door, when the sound of distant voices broke the entrancing silence. He stopped abruptly, slowly rotating to face the bedroom door. He could hear pounding, gradually getting louder. Obnoxiously loud voices swirled together, still too muffled to understand.

Bryan suddenly felt like a trapped animal. After everything he had experienced at the hands (and feet) of these oblivious giants, Bryan couldn't help but be mortified merely by their presence. The bedroom door was the only thing keeping him away from the behemoths. Despite his desperate need for aid, Bryan hoped the giants wouldn't come in.

The knob twisted and clicked, but to Bryan's confusion, the door didn't swing open. A booming laugh reverberated from the hall, and Bryan looked upwards, begging whatever deity would listen to keep them out.

Unsurprisingly, he didn't get what he wanted.

The door flew open with excessive force, hitting the wall with a resounding thwack! In the archway stood a lean and muscular teen, who towered miles high.

"Dude! Calm the fuck down!" Bryan recognized Trent's voice drifting from the hallway. The new giant ran a hand over his buzzed blond hair.

"Sorry man! Can't help my incredible strength!" he laughed as he stepped into the room with booming steps. Bryan looked to the floor at the titan's feet. Beneath his notice, various bugs streamed away, fleeing his quaking steps. A ship sized sneaker lifted with surprising ease, and Bryan watched in horror as it crashed down onto a group of fleeing ants. A quick glance to the teen's face confirmed he had no idea what he had just done.

The titan just kept walking, his foot lifting away, leaving nothing but indiscernible debris in its wake. Trent finally appeared, as fearsome as ever, and stomped into the room behind the first giant. In his hand he clutched a bulging, brown paper bag dotted with grease stains.

The first giant reached the bed in only three booming steps and allowed himself to fall backwards onto it. The entire room quaked violently as the mattress springs creaked loudly in protest.

"Are you just trying to break every fucking thing in my house?" Trent growled as he pounded up to the TV at the foot of the bed. He knelt down, exposing his grimy shoe soles. Bryan couldn’t help but stare at the clods of dirt, small pebbles, and a mangled spider carcass packed into the defined tread. Trent placed the bag on the floor as he began fumbling with a mess of cords around a stadium sized game console.

The bed creaked in protest as Trent's massive friend shifted and sat back up. "I can go home, and take the food with me!" he taunted playfully.

Trent snapped his head towards his friend. "Paul... we don't joke about things like that!" he said in a mockingly serious tone before returning to the console. Following a light vibration, Paul whipped his phone out of his pocket.

Bryan stood not four feet away feeling confused. On one hand the titanic teens were monstrous and threatening with their very presence. And yet watching their friendly exchange made them seem approachable and normal. Bryan sighed, almost overcome with emotion. They werenormal! He was the one who wasn't normal; all at his own fault!

Bryan shook his head. That wouldn't change if he stood here lost in his mind! He moved forward, suppressing the urge to run as Trent stood to his towering height. He took a single step, his shoe landing on a discarded potato chip. It crumbled easily and Trent gave no indication he had even noticed it. Bryan frowned, that thing had been many times larger than him! The situation didn't seem even remotely hopeful.

Trent dropped onto the bed next to Paul as the TV started blaring an announcement for a racing game. Their faces were blank as they became totally engrossed in the game, sounds of revving engines and skidding tires filling the room. Bryan shook his head; to him video games were a wasteful distraction from more productive intellectual pursuits. Though he supposed in this situation, that distraction would grant him safe passage right up the behemoths.

As he continued marching forward, Bryan intently studied both of the titans, since they were far more interesting than anything else in the room. He watched mystified as both became increasingly tense, their incredibly long arms and legs flexing subtly. Trent had a single leg hanging off the bed, light brown hairs coated its surface, appearing like a forest devoid of foliage. His enormous shoe swayed ominously, barely scraping the ground. Suddenly sounds of crunching metal blasted from the TV and Trent, visibly excited, kicked his leg while roaring in reaction to the game.

His foot connected with the forgotten bag of food, tipping it over and spilling its contents onto the floor. Bryan stopped and whimpered as plane sized fries sped towards him. The outliers just barely reached him, most of the food spread before him like a battle scene.

"Oh shit!" Trent gasped. With a click all of the sounds of the game ceased so that for a second only the giants' breathing could be heard. Bryan was still frozen in shock at the massive food that had rushed up to meet him. His head snapped up at the groaning and shifting of the mattress as Trent stood up. He took a quaking step, leaning down to his spilled meal.

Bryan gasped as Trent seemed to be staring right at him. His huge body blocked out the ceiling light, leaving his chest and handsome face in shadow. Huge hands soared down, as though they would snatch him up. Instead the thick fingers deftly picked up a few of the fallen fries. Trent raised them to his thick lips that formed an "O" and gave them a gusting blow.

"Five second rule!" he thundered, flashing a winning smile. He easily popped them into his mouth. While chewing he turned his enormous head towards Paul. "Let's eat before the food gets all nasty," he suggested. Trent's mountainous body blocked Bryan's view of the bed, but more creaking and groaning of the mattress signaled Paul obliging.

"Whatever dude, you just know I was about to beat your ass and you needed a reason to break my focus so you can try to win!" Paul's voice rang out from behind Trent. With a couple booming steps, Paul dropped to the floor with a quake across from Trent. Trent had meanwhile started snatching up the rest of the fallen food from the floor.

To say Bryan felt nervous would be an understatement. One moment he had been approaching the two enormous young men, and the next he was surrounded by them. Bryan remained rooted in place by indecision, fearful he would make the wrong choice that would get him killed.
1121221122112211122112111121112221.title: A teenager and his friend

choices: Trent
Paul
11212211221122111221121111211122212.content:
Paul watched Trent pick up the individual fries with a frown. “Y’know at this rate your five second rule will expire!” he said seriously. “Then help me!” Trent grunted in response without looking up. Paul scanned the floor of spilled food again. Bryan, too overwhelmed to react, stares dumbly at the behemoth with a sense of trepidation.

A shadow extended out from the blond giant as his arm shot forward like a missile. Bryan watched its progress as it slammed down behind him with a deep thud. Without warning it started sweeping towards him, collecting fallen fries and other debris indiscriminately. Finally snapped out of his stupor, Bryan shrieked and began to bolt. After a second he realized he was running straight away from it in his panic, which would do nothing to help him. He sharply curved to his right, but the damage was already done. With a rough scratching the giants were deaf to, Paul’s fleshy palm collided with him. Bryan was swept off his feet yelping in pain and shock as he tumbled and spun wildly.

Bryan couldn’t tell what was up or down, as the world became a chaotic, blurry spiral. Without warning, he found himself covered in semi-shadow. A tug in his stomach told him he was being rapidly lifted, though his destination was unknown. In spite of the thunderous conversation of the behemoths, all Bryan could hear clearly was his own heavy panting. His spinning mind struggled to hold onto even a shred of a clear thought, desperately trying to process the situation. However his typically genius intellect was too overwhelmed by his predicament to do a single thing.

Bryan wasn’t even given a moment of reprieve, as his ascent unexpectedly became a descent. Whatever had been holding him and the fries was gone, and all he knew was that he was plummeting downwards uncontrollably. And sooner than later he would inevitably hit the ground.

---

Paul dumped the fries back into the cardboard tray they had been in, swiping his hands together for good measure. Trent nodded towards the fries, “Did you just sweep some shit off my floor with those?”

Paul sighed and rolled his eyes. “No, the floor was clean!” he replied dismissively. Trent grumbled wordlessly in response. “Quit being a pussy! You’ll live!” Paul snapped.
Trent shrugged, dropping the fries he had picked up on top of the rest so that he could start eating.

---

Bryan grunted as he landed roughly. He rolled for a second, his eyes still squeezed shut, before tumbling off some kind of edge. He let out a surprised whoop and his eyes shot open just as he landed a few feet down, squarely on his back.

Staring straight up, yellow fries crossed his view like fallen redwoods. Around him were the fries that had been retrieved from the floor, as well as various bits of dust, fuzz, and debris that had been collected unintentionally. Bryan groaned as pain coursed through his body, but warmth from the fry he lay on was admittedly soothing. He could hear roaring voices from above, but was too focused on the pain to pay attention to their words.

Without warning more fries crashed down from above. Bryan shrieked as he was catapulted out of the mountain of criss-crossing fries. He arced through the air what felt like hundreds of feet but was must have only an inch or two. He crashed down, still amongst the fries, howling in pain as his right side bore the brunt of the impact.

Breathing heavily, Bryan rolled onto his back, allowing the heat from the fry to comfort him once again.

Towering high above, the titanic teens pulled their sandwiches from the bag, unaware of their tiny prisoner. Their broad chests loomed above like sheer cliffs, heaving in rhythm to their gusting breaths. Up above, their faces remained expressionless as they divided up their meal and Trent grunted something about ketchup. Bryan was awed by the mountains of food they were prepared to devour. He understood the monstrous appetites of teenage boys, but at this size it was insane! Worst of all, he was now on the menu!

Knowing he desperately needed to get their attention before he was devoured, Bryan forced himself to sit-up. He frantically waved his arms and screamed at the one named Paul as his pasture sized hand closed around the humongous burger. Following the loud crinkling of unwrapping the sandwich, Paul didn’t hesitate to sink his teeth into it. Bryan’s waving became less spirited as Paul chewed loudly. With every movement of his jaw his lips parted with a smack and his breathing became obviously audible.

Mortified by this display, Bryan turns around to see Trent switching the TV back to cable before snatching a couple fries from the other end of the container. The TV blaring in the background masked the sound of the teenagers’ eating on top of his own desperate pleas. He didn’t even wave this time. Mostly because he couldn’t help but be awed as Trent lifted the miles long fries to his mouth, stretching out an impossibly long tongue to snatch them up.

“This is impossible!” Bryan fretted. Looking around him, the fry he sat on stretched away in two directions. One end towards Trent and the other end towards Paul. He had no idea which was the fastest to the edge, but he figured his chances of getting noticed would be easier if the massive teenagers weren’t trying to eat him.

Not wasting another second, Bryan started heading towards…
11212211221122111221121111211122212.title: Indecision's Consequence

choices: Trent comes back downstairs
Someone else walks through the front door
112122112211221112211211112112.content:
Bryan yelped as he felt his shirt tear completely. With surprisingly fast reflexes he clutched the fly's thorny leg and held fast. His movement however seemed to imbalance the fly as the thing dove downwards.About to collide with the table's surface the fly pulled upward suddenly. The abrupt movement proved too much for Bryan and he lost his grip.

He yelled in terror as he fell downwards at an angle. Grunting on contact, Bryan rolled before finally stopping. His chest heaved as he took deep breaths while simultaneously mentally checking for any injuries.

The fly buzzed away, apparently no longer interested in the tiny man. As Bryan calmed down and his breathing returned to normal, he sat up. "Augh" he groaned, his hand flying to his forehead automatically. The ride with the fly had made him very dizzy which was making him nauseous. In his pain Bryan didn't notice as a lawn mower outside ceased to roar outside. Sitting still Bryan hoped the sick feelings would pass, as this was only going to make to harder to accomplish anything productive.

---

Trent cut the motor of the lawn mower and sighed. "Fuck, its hot!" he grunted, happy to be done.Pushing the mower through the grass, he returned it to the lonely shed at the back fence.

In his pocket, his phone buzzed. Trent ignored the sweat dripping down his face and pulled it out. Squinting at the screen he grinned at a message from his friend asking if he was up to hanging out. He crossed the yard as he typed out a reply.

Being the oldest child, Trent always ended up with the hardest chores, including yard work. Not that the 18 year old had any problem handling it. Standing 6'2", with short cropped dark brown hair, he wore dark blue shorts, a sweat-stained shirt with no sleeves, and a relatively new pair of black and blue Nike Air Force high tops. He was a proud high school athlete, and any one could tell by looking at him.

As he jumped onto the back porch his toned stomach rumbled with hunger. Trent placed his hand against it as he reached the back door.

---

Bryan's head snapped up in reaction to a loud creek and gust of wind to his right. He groaned, still recovering from the flight and fall from the fly. Bright light from outside outlined a towering silhouette. A gigantic teenager strode inside, his entire body glistening in a sheen of sweat that outlined his rippling muscles. Bryan gasped in surprise with the entrance of such an impressive titan. He used his arm to wipe his brow of sweat as he slammed the door shut, causing the table to shudder.

He stood still for a moment, as if to give Bryan time to absorb just how large he was. A strange growl sounded through the room and the giant stepped forward. Bryan yelped as he approached the table, his footstep causing the surface to rattle. He passed by fluidly, like a cruise ship. The shirt's white fabric was drenched with sweat. Each step caused a quake that rattled the table, his footsteps squeaking loudly on the tile. Bryan was thankful he hadn't landed on the floor and thus didn't have to deal with what were undoubtedly terrifyingly large feet.

The titan thuded into the living room and disappeared up the stairs, the occasional creak reminding Bryan of his presence.

Feeling better Bryan stood up and looked around the table. A smooth wooden surface, with a few minuscule crumbs that were easily overlooked by the giants were like boulders spread around him. Besides that the table was bare, there weren't even salt and pepper shakers. He had no choice but to wait.

---

Trent paused in the kitchen allowing the cold air to engulf him before slamming the door shut. His stomach growled as he scanned the empty kitchen. Before he ate, though, he decided to change out of his nasty shirt. Walking through the kitchen, Trent was unaware how loud and heavy each of his footsteps were as they rattled the room. He rushed up the stairs to his room, his hunger making move even faster.
112122112211221112211211112112.title: Short Distance, Big Difference

choices: Trent chows down
One of Trent's buddies bursts through the door.
1121221122112211122112111121121.content:
Trent pounds down the stairs, the slap of his footsteps echoing off the hardwood. Having lived in the house most of his life, the now normal sound didn't even register in his consciousness. He now sported a white and blue t-shirt from his junior year football playoffs. As he crosses the living room his stomach growls again. Trent Parker is ready to eat!" he announces to the empty kitchen.

Returning to the kitchen he pulls the ancient fridge open, its hum magnified as an orange glow bathes him. Trent frowns, scratching his short, brown hair while trying to decide. He could make nachos or a sandwich with the stuff in here. Also there were some leftovers from his mother's lasagna from the other night. Checking the freezer revealed a frozen pizza Trent knew he would hate, and nothing else he could work with. He spun around, using his momentum to shut the freezer door.

Walking towards the pantry he passed the table, kicking the toe of his shoe against a table leg. "Ha! Had my shoe on motherfucker!" he scoffs at the table before opening the cupboard. Microwaveable popcorn and boxes of mac and cheese stood out as his only options amongst canned food and spices he had no interest in.

Trent returns to the fridge, wrenches the door open, and leans down to get a close look at the food. He didn't want nachos, and he was pretty sure the lasagna was supposed to be saved for tonight's dinner. That left one option: the sandwich. Easy to make and delicious; it sounded like a good choice. Trent grabs lunch meat, cheese, a plastic jar of mayonnaise, a baggie of lettuce, and a loaf of bread. One by one they were carelessly tossed onto the table behind him, without a backwards glance.

The jars in the fridge rattle as he shuts the door and side-steps to the silverware drawer for a knife. Tool in hand, Trent returns to the table where his sandwich ingredients rest haphazardly. Pulling out two slices of bread, Trent drops them onto the table. After spreading mayonnaise on the bread he wonders what his side dish should be. Returning to the pantry, he pulls out a bag of chips and tosses them onto the table. The bag lands on the table and falls to its side, spilling chips all over.

“Dammit” Trent grumbles, snatching up the bag. Holding the opening at the edge of the table with one hand, he uses the other to sweep the chips back into the bag. Gently placing the bag on the table, he walks back to the beginnings of his sandwich. Still feeling chip crumbs on his palms he swipes them together.

He drops a generous amount of meat on each slice. However he places a single slice of cheese on one side, while the other gets a few leaves of lettuce. Happy with its construction he squishes the sandwich together. He quickly returns all the ingredients to the fridge, and grabs a plate from a cabinet.

Though his mother wouldn’t like it, he decides to eat in front of the TV. Besides he had been outside for hours, he deserved a good break. Placing his food on the coffee table, Trent plops down onto the sofa with a smack and subsequent creak of protest. He leans forward and moves his food onto the sofa cushion next to him and props his feet onto the coffee table.

Using the remote to switch the TV on, Trent feels an itch at his ankle. He reaches down his long leg and digs his fingernails into his skin. Mere inches from his hand, his shoe soles are illuminated by the TV. Though fairly new, the black and blue tread was already packed with dirt, unidentifiable grime, and a hardened piece of gum as well as blades of grass and flattened bugs from earlier that day. Trent however was utterly unaware of the devastation caused by his simple footsteps as well as the messy and gruesome display trapped underneath his shoe soles.

Finally settling on a rerun of Friends, Trent leans back into the overstuffed cushions of the couch to get comfortable. He places his plate onto his lap as his stomach growls once again.

---

A quick and loud series of pounds emits from the living room. Bryan, feeling better, turns towards the noise. Sure enough the incredibly tall teenager is returning to the kitchen, now dressed in a more colorful t-shirt. A strange growl emits from the giant. "TRENT PARKER IS READY TO EAT!" the giant roars. His voice is deafening, and rather terrifying to tiny Bryan. As the giant enters the kitchen Bryan shakes away the fear and looks closer at the new shirt. It has the logo from Tommy's high school on it! Mr. Smith is thrilled, hoping that when he contacts the young titan, he could take him to Tommy.

Yet again, each of the giant's footsteps rattle the table as the giant approaches the skyscraper of a fridge. He easily pulls it open and stands still for a moment before opening the freezer above as well. Bryan, watching the behemoth intently, jumps when his sudden movement sends the doors crashing shut with a thundering gust.

Apparently as he crosses the kitchen, his foot collides with the table and the entire surface quakes, knocking Bryan off his feet. "HA! HAD MY SHOE ON MOTHERFUCKER!" the teen thunders at the table, showering Bryan with a spray of saliva. As Bryan tries to clean himself off the towering young man scans the pantry before stomping back to the fridge.

Bryan can't helped but be awed by the enormous giant who exuded power with his every casual movement. That each footstep rattled Bryan's world. The defined muscles that dwarfed hills. The fact that he appeared so large, yet moved so quickly and effortlessly. Though in reality just a regular teenager (an athletically gifted one at that) the monstrous Trent strikes fear into Bryan’s heart. He tries to keep calm, knowing the titanic teen is currently his only chance of rescue.

Trent had reopened the fridge and leaned down, whatever he was investigating obscured by his gigantic torso. Bryan hears the sound of crinkling plastic and with a loud thud, a massive container of lunch meat crashes onto the table. He screams as Trent launches massive food items out of the fridge at random. Each one crashes down with a quaking thud, thankfully missing Bryan. His heart pounding in his chest, Bryan decides to at least get to the other side of the table. Trent is starting to seem very dangerous.

Bryan rushes away as Trent retrieves a knife and returns to the edge of the table. Bryan looks back at the behemoth as he continues to flee. Towering far over the table, Trent looks like something out of a myth. His handsome face is void of emotion as he smoothly removes two slices of bread from the loaf and lets them plop onto the table. "Right where I was!" Bryan cries out, relief flooding his body that he had avoided that problem. Trent uses the broad knife to spread what seems to Bryan to be a boatload of mayonnaise onto the bread.

Bryan slows to a stop, finally across the table where he believes he can watch the titan in relative safety. Trent drops the knife onto the table with a piercing clang. Bryan cringes from the noise as the giant thuds across the kitchen once more. Before Bryan can react, Trent removes a bag of chips from the cupboard and tosses them onto the table. "Oh, not again!" Bryan moans as he watches the bag tip towards him in slow motion. Sure enough chips come flying out, sliding across the surface with a few surrounding Bryan.

"DAMMIT" thunders the giant from above. Crinkling sounds across the table as the bag of chips is up-righted and flies out of sight. Trent's immense arm stretches overhead. Bryan yelps as immediately following a thud, he hears a quickly approaching scraping noise. Before he can move, a wall of flesh shoving the chips appears. Bryan screams as it collides with him. He sticks to Trent's vast palm with various chip crumbs. At the edge of the table he watches the chips plunge back into the bag.

Screaming once more, Trent's arm moves wildly as he approaches his sandwich. Apparently suddenly conscious of the crumbs on his hands, he wipes them together. Bryan's body stings from the collision as he goes into free-fall with the freed crumbs. He lands with a splat in something surprisingly soft. Forcing himself to open his eyes he sees Trent's chest towering right above, before his view is obscured by a crushing pink, object. The smell is unmistakable: lunch meat. He had landed in the massive teenager's sandwich.

Bryan struggles, with little success, to move in the constricting sauce and meat. He can hear more things thudding onto the sandwich above, as well as sudden pressure in what he assumes is Trent finishing the sandwich. "Good God. He’s going to eat me!" Bryan gasps. The world tilts and sways before dropping suddenly as Trent relocates to the living room. There is nearly a minute of rest before another jarring movement. As the motions cease once more, a loud gurgling noise sounds very near. The giant was resting the plate against his stomach, the ominous noise torturing tiny Bryan.
1121221122112211122112111121121.title: Trent Parker is ready to eat!

11212211221122111221121111211211.content:
The sounds of the show fill the room as Trent lifts the sandwich up to his mouth for the first bite.

“Mmmmmm!” Trent groans. It was better than he expected, although that may have just been due to his hunger. While chewing quickly, he brings the sandwich to his lips, swallows the bite in his mouth and immediately sinks his teeth into the sandwich, ripping out another large bite. Not feeling as desperate, Trent doesn’t chew as quickly.

His attention mostly focused on the show, Trent swallows as he reaches for the bag of chips. Grasping a small handful he brings his hand to his wide open mouth and shoves them in. As his teeth come together a loud crunch sounds across the room, followed by a rhythmic chomping. Following another loud gulp, Trent’s lips part as he unconsciously uses his tongue to probe at chunks of bread stuck inside his cheek.

Trent makes quick work of the sandwich and chips as the show goes on. He is barely conscious of the food as it passes into his mouth and slips down his throat. After sinking his jaws into the sandwich yet again, a sudden funny moment elicits a roar of laughter from Trent. Light illuminates soggy, half-chewed piles of food in his mouth, and ropes of thick saliva. Calming down, Trent quickly moves the food to the back of his mouth and with a gulp it is gone.

He pops a few more chips in his mouth, the grinding noise drowning out the show. To remedy this Trent chews faster and swallows too soon. After a moment of struggle he manages to get the food down. He reaches towards the plate and grabs the last piece of the sandwich. Bringing it to his mouth, his tongue stretches forward, and he easily pops it into his mouth. After a few moments of chewing Trent gulps it down and can feel a satisfying feeling of fullness from his stomach.

---

Bryan screams again as he feels the entire area shiver as Trent takes his first bite. Though he can't see anything yet, Bryan imagines Trent's jagged teeth crashing together as he nonchalantly destroys the sandwich around Bryan. Bryan continues to squirm, hoping against all odds that he can still escape. A gulp from outside is immediately followed by another jarring bite that feels significantly closer. Bryan, having watched his nephew Zack grow up, knew just how ruthless teenage boys were with their food. They gulped down mounds in mere minutes. Trent it seemed, was no exception.

A deafening crunch, followed by muted ones, reminds Bryan just how close his doom is. Every sound of the giant eating, harmless at normal size, struck Bryan with icy terror. Another gulp. Another quaking bite. More crunching chips and smacks of chewing. Repeat.

The situation is getting overwhelming and Bryan begins to sink into a horrified stupor. That is, until a wall of white comes crashing down just to his left. It pulls away with a deafening rip as the lips close around the latest catch. Bryan watches frozen as Trent's thick lips shift, the sound of chewing louder but still muted. Occasionally his mouth opens to reveal chunks of food flying around the dark cavern. The lips purse and a gulp sounds ahead of Bryan.

Bryan realizes too late that he had wasted precious time. "Augh! no, No, NO!" he wails, struggling to back away as the sandwich moves towards the mouth. Trent’s tongue springs forward, soggy lumps of bread, chunks of meat, flakes of lettuce and shards of chip are spread across its surface. Strands of saliva stretch from the tongue up to the sharp molars, packed with chewed sandwich remains. For just a second Bryan can see the massive teenager's face staring blankly at the TV. He is unaware of Bryan's struggle, and unconcerned with the fate of his meal.

A shrill scream of anger and fear erupts from Bryan as he moves forward, underneath the wall of perfectly straight white teeth. The air within the mouth is thick with humidity and stench. The surface of the tongue, and the gruesome bits of food collide with the sandwich. As Trent bites into the sandwich, Bryan and the bite of sandwich are blanketed in darkness. Without a moment's reprieve, Trent begins to chew.

Bryan rolls and falls with the quick movements. The amplified squishes surround him, reminding him there is no safe direction. He hits teeth and slides across the tongue before colliding into a soggy pile of bread. Trent's lips part briefly a few times, showing Bryan terrible flashes of glinting teeth and soggy mounds of food.

Suddenly the entire cavern is flooded with light as the mouth is wide open. Trent is... laughing. Bryan shudders, seeing the multicolored mess of chewed food piled around him, chunks hanging from above and thick ropes of saliva vibrating with the laughter. Beyond the towering, razor-sharp teeth, stretches Trent's legs ending in his blue and black Nikes, pointed at the TV where the characters stand surprised. It almost looks as though Bryan himself is watching TV, save for the gruesome mess he is trapped in. As the laughter fades, the lips come together once more.

Sealed in darkness again, the tongue underneath heaves. "Nooo! Don't swallow me, you can still save me!" Bryan pleads as the tongue forces him to join the chewed bite to the back of the mouth. Unable to hear the pleas within his mouth Trent swallows, the squelching gulp echoing around him as he is violently sucked into the throat.

Outside a mere bob of his Adam's apple signals Bryan's passing into Trent's chest.

Bryan wants to sob, but the hulking pressure of the esophagus is preventing him from doing anything. Around him he hears the pounding heart, and gusting lungs hard at work for the living giant Bryan is sinking into. He is squeezed through a sphincter, landing with a splat in a dim chamber. Around him wrinkly wet pink walls gently pulse. He lays atop a mountain of soggy chewed sandwich, mixed with chip mush. Above him he hears a loud crunching. "Of course Trent would continue to eat," Bryan muttered bitterly, "It's not like anything significant just happened!" He hears several gulps above, as though Trent is having a difficult time swallowing. Survival instinct kicks in and Bryan attempts to move away from the stomach entrance. He trips and yells as he slides down the disgusting slope. Not a moment too soon as Trent's latest bite drops into the stomach with a smack.

Bryan racks his mind for a solution. His genius discovery had landed him inside a massive teenager's stomach. Surely, Bryan reasoned deliriously, he could find a way out!

---

Getting more comfortable in the overstuffed couch cushions, he continues to absently munch on the chips until the show ends. Trent gives no thought to the specifics of his full stomach. He doesn't imagine the disgusting interior with its sodden mountain of saliva drenched food. He is completely oblivious to the minuscule man trapped in his stomach as more chip mush rains in. Not for one second does he think about the violent fate his meal would meet inside his gut. Trent is only concerned with the world he lives in, and its main event: the TV show.

The world inside him that is his digestive tract did not exist for Trent. It only existed for Bryan and would soon eradicate him. As Trent continues to stare blankly at the screen, he has no way to hear the pleas for help and frustrated screams of Bryan. The tiny man struggles to move, unable to come up with an escape.

Trent glances at his phone, realizing its time to go meet his friends. He stands, leaving a plate strewn with crumbs and crumpled bag of chips on the coffee table. He walks out the front door, and down the block, his feet crunching against the pavement. In the park a few of his friends have started a game of basketball. He jogs through the grass to them and joins the game.

As Trent moves about wildly during the game, each slamming footstep jarring his body, Bryan feels it ten times worse. The food slides and shifts in a thick storm of movement. Bryan yelps and begs for help, struggling to stay afloat. But there is no one who can hear.

The game ends and the group of boys walks to one's house for a round of video games. Bryan cheers as he managed to stay alive, perhaps after all this he could make it out! At that moment, acids begin to flood the stomach. It rises around the mounds of soggy food, as the walls move aggressively.

Trent doesn't notice as his stomach begins to churn violently, nor does he hear his unnoticed passenger's protests of terror. Bryan climbs higher to avoid the acids, but has little hope as the stomach moves wildly. He doesn't last long before he is swept wailing into the acids and dissolving food. Pain becomes his only thought before he finally passes out to perish in silence.

Trent, unaware of the gruesome happening inside his gut, enjoys the rest of the relaxing and uneventful night.

A week later Trent sees that a man who lived nearby had been reported missing. "Scary shit!" he muttered as he popped a couple Cheetos into his mouth. Unaware of his role in the man's disappearance; Trent carries deep within his stomach all that is left of the genius, Bryan Smith.

The front door suddenly flew open, causing Trent to forget the pesky ant.

They were both on the high school basketball team, so they often went out to shoot hoops in their free time.

"I texted you like a hundred times!" Paul scolded. Glancing at the flashing TV, he idly scratched his buzzed blond head. "Thought we were going to the park today?"

Trent sighed in response and explained his day spent mowing the lawn. "I just finished like 5 minutes ago..." Trent said as he pulled his cell phone out to confirm the alleged texts. "Fucking starved!"

Paul grinned at his friend's sandwich hungrily. "It was a long walk here, dude..." He hinted coyly, and propped his own large feet on the coffee table. The young guy gave his buddy a pat and casually leaned over and snatched the sandwich plate.

Before Trent could properly react, Paul took a bite of the hearty snack and then dropped it when Trent lunged to retrieve it. "Goddammit, man!" Trent looked at his ruined creation laying in pieces on the floor. He glared back up at his buddy, who stifled a laugh through his full mouth.

112122112211221112211211112112121.content:
With an angry grunt, Trent began to pick up the pieces of his sandwich. However after only a few seconds he sat back up and snapped at Paul "God, didn't your mother teach you to chew with your fucking mouth closed!?"

For one second Paul was surprised, as he hadn't realized that he had been chewing with his mouth open. Recovering quickly he leaned towards Trent and gnashed his jaws, loudly crushing the food. "Do you want some? I can share!" For added effect, Paul stuck out his long tongue.

Trent, seeing the half chewed food and strands of saliva in his friend's mouth, makes a face. "Fuck you Paul," he grunts, punching him in the chest.

A small chunk of the chewed sandwich is knocked loose, landing in Paul's hand. Closing his mouth, Paul looks down at it. "Well that was convenient!" he says happily, tossing the chunk of food back into his mouth.

As Trent returns to picking up the pieces of his sandwich, Paul resumes chewing, once again obliviously with his mouth open.

---

Bryan's panicked struggles are accomplishing little, but his mind is drawing blanks for alternatives. He feels the entire sandwich move, and freezes in fear. A moment of calm is followed by a slam, thudding, and thundering voices. However, with everything muted by the bread, Bryan has no clue what's going on.

A violent lurch, however, elicits a screech of fear and before Bryan knows it, a deafening crunch coupled with extreme pressure surrounds him. "I'm being eaten," Bryan realizes in horror.

With a lurch to the side and another crunch, the world around him falls apart. In mere seconds he witnesses building sized molars mercilessly crush the sandwich that had just seemed so solid. With every movement light flashes, illuminating sharp teeth, and thick ropes of saliva between the mutilated chunks of food.

Everything stops abruptly. Light streams in through, what Bryan recognizes to be, the opening of the mouth. He finds himself rolled into a large ball of semi-chewed food.

Light floods the cavern as the mouth opens wide and the teeth repeatedly come crashing together with loud splats. Bryan is both terrified and mystified by this odd and destructive act, done simply by a teenager's teeth. A roar gusts through before the tongue beneath him slides out into the light.

Bryan gasps in shock to see Trent's mountainous face closeup, sneering in disgust. "HELP ME!" he shrieks, waving his free arm. Around him, the partially chewed food glints in the light, saliva stretching between the slowly shifting chunks.

"Wait, who's this?!" Bryan wonders in surprise. Looking up simply reveals a rounded nose tip above. Ahead of him, Trent dismisses the disgusting mouthful, looking away as he thunders "FUCK YOU PAUL!"

"No!" Bryan begs before feeling the pull of gravity as his chunk of food falls free. He is still screaming after landing. Around him thick, long fingers stretch outwards. He looks up to see an unfamiliar face staring down, placing him in shadow.

"HELP ME, PLEASE!" Bryan repeats to this new giant who he can only assume is Paul. The giant's thick lips are stretched into a smile, his blue eyes glinting happily. Bryan imagines he was seen. "WELL, THAT WAS CONVENIENT!" Paul thunders, saliva and food pieces showering Bryan. Bryan only has the chance to grunt in confusion, before the enormous mouth widens, and he flies upwards. Bryan's screams louder than ever as he is launched back into the hills of soggy chewed chunks.

---

Paul tried to ignore Trent as he ranted while picking up the ruined pieces of his sandwich. "... and I was so fucking hungry! Then you came along!" Trent continued.

"Bro!" Paul interrupted. He paused to swallow before continuing "I just wanted a single bite, it was an accident. I'm sorry, move on!" Trent glared at him for a second, before grunting and snatching up the slice of cheese from the floor. Paul's stomach growled, clearly unsatisfied with the single bite of sandwich. "Now I'm hungry," Paul states bluntly.

"Would you like a fucking sandwich?" Trent snaps in return as he stands up. Paul rolls his eyes as he watches Trent stomp into the kitchen before following his friend. Trent dumps the ruined sandwich into the garbage as Paul strolls in. "Let's go somewhere!" he suggests, pausing for a moment. "Like King's! Their cheese fries sound bomb!"

Trent sighs, an annoyed expression still on his face. "Well there's nothing left here, so we might as well..." he trails off.

"Sweet! I'll text Jared and Ryan to meet us there!" Paul says excitedly. Trent grabs his keys and the two boys head out the front door and pound down the steps. As Paul texts, his tongue unconsciously probes his mouth for stray chunks of food.

---

As Paul continued to chew, Bryan watched the food be mutilated further. In one moment that had lasted forever, he had ended up underneath a row of jagged molars, chunks of bread and meat hanging from them. Against all odds, when the teeth came together, he was pushed sideways and descended downwards, below the gum-line.

It seemed Paul never shut his mouth as, after gulping the bite down, light illuminated his surroundings. Rising above him were soft pink walls and above those, ivory towers that had a few remaining chunks of food stuck to them.

Bryan lay still, next to a small hill of bread mush, detached from his reality. So much had happened in the last minute. He had been eaten by some random teenager like a simple crumb. Although as far as Paul and Trent were concerned, that's all he was. Really he was less than that. The towering teenagers were completely unaware of his very existence. This massive youth had no idea of the tiny scientist trapped in his mouth.

Bryan was shaken from his thoughts with the appearance of a massive monster. The pink tip of Paul’s tongue was pushing down towards him, easily warping the mouth wall to fit lower. Small bits of bread still clung to its slimy surface as it searched for stray bits of food.

Bryan sputtered in terror, attempting to crawl backwards to escape. The gigantic thing lapped at the pile of bread mush and retreated, having retrieved the majority of the pile. Bryan breathed a sigh of relief and lay back down, already drenched to the core in sticky saliva.

He struggled against shock, fear, and hopelessness that threatened to overwhelm and completely shut down his mind.

He quickly decided action would prevent a total breakdown. Bryan figured he ought to head towards the front of the mouth. After all that was the only exit he wanted to take out of the foul cavern.

He began following the line of towering teeth, trying not to slip on the disgustingly moist “ground”.

On the way there, Paul chatted with Trent, occasionally sang obnoxiously with songs blaring from the radio, and laughed loudly at a cross-dressed pedestrian they passed. He had no clue that every sound he made caused more distress to an unnoticed passenger trekking along his gum-line.

Trent pulls into a parking lot past a sign in the shape of a crown reading “King’s” with “Royally delicious” written underneath. Paul jumps out of the car as soon as it stops, his sneakers crunching against the pavement. Trent kills the engine and rushes after his buddy yelling “Calm the fuck down!”

He walks through the front door to find Paul scanning the restaurant for the rest of their friends. Trent and Paul, both towering well over 6 feet tall, have little problem finding the table with their friends near the back.

Seated at the table are Ryan and Jared. Ryan, who was half-Mexican and had the tan skin to show for it, is wearing a simple black t-shirt and dark jeans. Though hidden under the table, his shoes are red and black versions of the ones Trent has.

While Trent, Paul, and Ryan all stand within inches of each other, Jared was noticeably shorter. He made up for this with his bulk, making him invaluable in wrestling and football. His green shirt was stretched tight against his muscles, and his gray shorts and white flip flops showed off his thick legs.

The group of boys were some of the top athletes at their school, and had been friends for a long time already. As Paul and Trent approached the table all four loudly greeted each other, some of their foul language earning them dirty stares from other customers.

A waitress approached the table with menus in one hand and a steaming plate in the other. “For you!” she chirped, handing Trent and Paul each a menu. “And the cheese fries!” she added, placing the plate into the center of the table. With a smile and a nod she rushed off to help other customers.

Paul’s mouth watered, staring at the heap of fries smothered in cheese, bacon, and some flecks of spices. A bowl of ranch sat like a lake in the middle of the dish. As he reached for the dip, Trent turned to his other two buddies.

A sudden rush of saliva sweeps him off his feet.

Before long Bryan flows onto the tongue. In the more open area the saliva spreads out, though it’s still as deep as a wading pool.

Bryan looks around, seeing gigantic molars protruding from the pink ceiling. In the jagged surfaces of his teeth, the occasional filling glints. Thick cords of saliva stretch and flow down from above. The long rough tongue, its surface constantly rolling sinks into the darkness of the throat. A long uvula hangs, its color a stark contrast to the blackness it precedes.

Bryan is amazed at the landscape like structure of this teenager’s mouth. The mountains of food that Bryan had been thrown into are long gone, as if they had never been there. Bryan stares into the deep throat, imagining the single bite that had sunken into its abyss, undoubtedly totally dismissed by the youth. The giant boy would never be able to appreciate how destructive his meals were.

Bryan turns away to face the front of the mouth, where the tip of the tongue meets the enormous, squareish front teeth.

But before he takes even a single step, a roar that he had recently become accustomed to erupts from behind. Bryan is sent flying, his screams of terror drowned out by Paul’s voice.

Jared hands the bowl of ranch to Trent, who pours a generous amount onto his own plate. He then hands the bowl across the table to Ryan.

The boys dig into the mountain of fries, while at the same time noisily talking and laughing. They search for the part of the pile with the most cheese and bacon and greedily snatch it up. After dragging through some ranch they lift it to their mouths and happily devour it. Focused on their conversation, they boys don’t think twice about the food sinking down their throats into their stomachs.

---

Bryan immediately begins to sweat from the heat. Fanning himself, he stands amid droplets of saliva. The rough and yellow ground is dotted with small black and white cubes. It stretches towards a flow of orange dotted with large red chunks. Steam rises from everywhere, and momentarily clouds his vision.

However looking up reveals a crystal clear sight. Towering around him are four giant teenagers, as if gathered around some mini arena. The shadows make them appear almost evil, as they chuckle thunder to each other. Bryan instantly recognizes Trent and a moment later Paul in their matching t-shirts. However a tan giant in black, and a bulky one in green are new to him.

“Oh not more teenagers!” Bryan shouts in exasperation. He sees Trent hand the tan one a large white dome. The words “King’s: Royally delicious” are printed on the bottom.

The realization hits him like a ton of bricks. He is standing on a mountain of fries, covered in cheese and bacon, surrounded by four massive and hungry high school boys!

Not a moment later, the bulky one’s hand reaches forward, easily removing a handful of fries. Bryan whimpers as it disappears from sight, before rising up to the giant’s mouth dripping with ranch. A massive tongue appears and the entire thing disappears behind the boy’s lips. He chews with a smile on his face as he talks to Trent. The other three boys do not waste any time as they snatch away pieces of the mountain and scarf them down.

Bryan tries to flee, but soon realizes he is surrounded by thick cheese. With no other choice Bryan begins waving and screaming, desperately hoping to get someone’s attention before they wolf him down without even noticing.

Unfortunately the boys’ booming voices easily drown him out. The occasional bit of conversation is actually understandable to his delicate ears and he learns the tan one is Ryan, and the bulky one is Jared.

He continues screaming as broad hands pluck away more fries. One moment he looks up to see Ryan staring right at him. “Yes! Right here!” Bryan shouts ecstatically. The boy’s greasy fingers soar over head, causing a small quake as they remove some fries supporting Bryan’s spot.

He howls in frustration. These boys would never notice him! They wouldn’t normally pay more than a passing glance to their food as they ate it; how would they ever discern his puny presence!

Tears in his eyes he gazes up at Ryan, whom he thought had noticed him. The boy is chewing the bite he had retrieved, ranch smeared on his cheek, as he grins listening to a story from Paul. Bryan turns to stare at Paul who is enthusiastically informing his friends about a crazy party with his cousin. Half chewed piles of fries are easily visible inside his mouth as he speaks. His friends don’t even react to it, though for Bryan it’s a terrible preview. Ahead of him Trent raises another chunk of fries to his lips. His tongue slides out of his mouth, pieces of food and smears of dip easily visible even to Bryan, before it snags the food and retreats behind the lips. Trent chews, while listening intently to the story.

Feeling yet another quake, Bryan locks his eyes on Jared’s meaty hand as it grasps a load of fries, each piece sticking at random. A strand of cheese connected to the pile thins before finally breaking as he pulls the food free. After dipping it into ranch, he stuffs it into his mouth, allowing half to hang from between his lips as he begins to chew.

A miserable sob rocks Bryan’s body as he gives up. These boys were enjoying a casual snack, as they hung out with each other. They were totally ignorant to his existence just in front of them. Their unwittingly disgusting eating habits were putting on an awful show for Bryan. And he knew, most likely in just a few minutes, he would be devoured in an equally brutal fashion. The only question remained which one it would be.

---

Jared didn’t even look down as he grasped a few more fries in his hand. Even if he had, he wouldn’t have noticed the small speck that went tumbling into some cheese still on the plate. As Jared continues stuffing his mouth, Ryan reaches into the pile. His hand lowers directly onto the overlooked speck, lifting a stack of fries to his plate.

He dips the pile into a lake of ranch before lifting it to his lips. His eyes are locked onto Trent as he tells a long joke. Had Ryan looked down, the small speck struggling in the ranch would not have been seen.

His mouth widens and Ryan unconsciously slides his tongue out towards the food. The speck is welcomed with glinting white teeth, and a tongue covered with mutilated fry remains and soggy strands of cheese. Its cries for help never reach any of the four boys’ ears.

Ryan doesn’t think for even a second as he chews the fries up. His teeth easily tear into the mound, sending the speck flying about chaotically, as the food is reduced to mush. He instinctively swallows the pulverized bite and begins to speak. The food descending into his chest doesn’t get a second thought.

Bryan and the fry mush land with a splat in the stomach, joining a soggy mountain of previous bites. Bryan continues to sob, merely awaiting the acids that he knows will soon come.

As he continues to eat, Ryan gives no thought to the food building up in his toned gut. He has no clue about the sobbing person trapped deep within his body. After the boys finish the fries and go their separate ways, Ryan never considers the meal inside him, awaiting digestion.

A few hours later he is seated on a couch at home, trying to find something to watch on TV. His meal, long forgotten, still rests in his stomach. Bryan lay immobile in a valley of chewed food, driven mad by his delayed fate inside the oblivious teenager.

A gurgle from his stomach signals the flow of acids into the stomach. The noise, gentle from Ryan’s perspective, goes beneath his notice. Ryan’s bored expression, illuminated by the TV, is the complete opposite of Bryan’s, whose face contorts into fear as the stomach acid storms around him and the once delicious looking food.

Ryan sighs unhappily. This was the worst part of his day by a long shot; there had been nothing good on TV for over an hour! He is unaware of the tiny genius trapped within his digestive tract, having a much worse time. Bryan’s pained screams echo around Ryan's cavernous stomach, his passing heard by none.
